name: OldWar 2
description:
OldWar 2 - will take thousands of years to come after the events of the first part.
The game is made in the genre of RTS (real-time strategy).
Each level has its own goal, which will not be so easy to achieve.
The war for resources can also turn the tide. It is necessary to capture the sources of gas.
Use buildings to hire and upgrade your soldiers. Do not forget to combine troops to achieve victory.
Also the task may complicate the nature itself. Tornadoes, lightning, meteorites can harm your soldiers or, on the contrary, help.



Features:
-10 levels
-Hazardous natural phenomena
-Dynamic gameplay
-Diverse tasks
-Complicated gameplay
